channel.title: house hunting on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in house hunting on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Looking at house in Tochigi
item.description: 12:23 Sunday 06 December 2015 JST We’re on the train now. It’s apparently a 9 minute walk from 藤岡駅. 68 minutes on Tokaido-Utsunomiya line and then 16 minutes on the Tobu-Nikko line or something. 15:30 Cute old house with a bit of a yard in front and nice neighbors on one side. The road out front is a bit too trafficked for Jennie to stay alive very long, and the train tracks are near enough that we can hear the RR crossing bell while inside the house.
